abstracts.cdata!:
Through this Northeast Irrigation
            Engineering Technical Assistance Project, the GOB hopes to
            create an adequate stock of well prepared irrigation
            projects for appraisal and construction, and provide
            technical assistance and training for the staff of Sao
            Francisco River Valley Development Company (CODEVASF),
            National Department of Drought-Related Works (DNOCS) and
            National Department of Sanitary Works (DNOS).  The project
            consists of:  (i) irrigation sector studies; and (ii)
            preparation for appraisal of twelve irrigation projects,
            covering an area of 500,000 hectares, and preparation for
            construction of some of these projects involving a potential
            area of 300,000 hectares.  It furthermore involves; (iii)
            construction of two pilot irrigation schemes; (iv)
            institution building measures affecting the executing
            agencies; and (v) drafting of safety guidelines for small dams.
